com.lef.scanner

接口 MonitorNotifier


  • public interface MonitorNotifier
    回调接口，需要实现回调接口中的方法，触发进入，离开某个自定义的regionRegion This interface is implemented by classes that receive iBeacon monitoring notifications
    另请参阅:
    IBeaconManager.setMonitorNotifier(MonitorNotifier notifier), IBeaconManager.startMonitoringBeaconsInRegion(Region region), Region

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int INSIDE
      指示智能终端进入了自定义的region
      Indicates the Android device is inside the Region of iBeacons
      static int OUTSIDE
      指示智能终端离开了自定义的region
      Indicates the Android device is outside the Region of iBeacons

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void didDetermineStateForRegion(int state, Region region)
      当进入离开region时状态发生变化时回调 Called with a state value of MonitorNotifier.INSIDE when at least one iBeacon in a Region is visible.
      void didEnterRegion(Region region)
      当进入自定义的region时回调 Called when at least one iBeacon in a Region is visible.
      void didExitRegion(Region region)
      当离开自定义的region时回调 Called when no iBeacons in a Region are visible.

    • 字段详细资料

      • INSIDE

        static final int INSIDE
        指示智能终端进入了自定义的region
        Indicates the Android device is inside the Region of iBeacons
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • OUTSIDE

        static final int OUTSIDE
        指示智能终端离开了自定义的region
        Indicates the Android device is outside the Region of iBeacons
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • didEnterRegion

        void didEnterRegion(Region region)
        当进入自定义的region时回调 Called when at least one iBeacon in a Region is visible.
        参数:
        region - a Region that defines the criteria of iBeacons to look for

      • didExitRegion

        void didExitRegion(Region region)
        当离开自定义的region时回调 Called when no iBeacons in a Region are visible.
        参数:
        region - a Region that defines the criteria of iBeacons to look for

      • didDetermineStateForRegion

        void didDetermineStateForRegion(int state,
                              Region region)
        当进入离开region时状态发生变化时回调 Called with a state value of MonitorNotifier.INSIDE when at least one iBeacon in a Region is visible. Called with a state value of MonitorNotifier.OUTSIDE when no iBeacons in a Region are visible.
        参数:
        state - either MonitorNotifier.INSIDE or MonitorNotifier.OUTSIDE
        region - a Region that defines the criteria of iBeacons to look for
